name: Len'en Tasouken - Earthen Miraculous Sword
summary: Len'en Tasouken ~ Earthen Miraculous Sword (連縁蛇叢釼 ～ Earthen Miraculous Sword) is a vertical-scrolling danmaku shoot 'em up and the second game of the Len'en Project. It was made by Trick Nostalgie's sole member JynX and released for the Windows operating system.
